snippet: New York State wraps up the public comment period on regulations it has proposed for policing a controversial gas extraction method.
abstract: New York State wraps up the public comment period on regulations it has proposed for policing a controversial gas extraction method.
lead_paragraph: As if the recent series of hearings and the invitation for written comments from the public were not enough, contingents from both sides of the fracking issue in New York State organized rallies and press conferences this week in anticipation of the close of the comment period on the state's proposed gas drilling regulations on Wednesday.
